jsimple.util

Class ByteArrayRange

  • java.lang.Object
    • jsimple.util.ByteArrayRange

  • public class ByteArrayRange
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a subset of a byte array, starting at the specified position & of the specified length. Basically, it's used as a shortcut to passing around the array, position, and length separately.
    Since:
    8/3/13 10:46 AM

      • toByteArray

        public byte[] toByteArray()
        Get a byte array just for this range. If the range occupies the full source array, then the source array is returned rather than making a copy. The caller should be aware that the returned byte array may or may not be the same as the source array. Generally, it's best to only use this when you are sure both the source array and returned byte array won't be changed.
        Returns:
